sentences.en: (= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.cn: 不锈钢小刀

sentences.en: a steel bridge
sentences.cn: 钢铁大桥

sentences.en: Every night you could hear the whistles of the steel mill.
sentences.cn: 每晚你都会听见炼钢厂的下班哨声。

sentences.en: He has wrists of steel.
sentences.cn: 他有钢铁般的手腕。

sentences.en: He makes decorative vessels in copper, stainless steel and silver.
sentences.cn: 他用铜、不锈钢和银制造装饰性器皿。

sentences.en: His life was saved by a quarter-inch-thick bullet-proof steel screen.
sentences.cn: 多亏一块1/4英寸厚的防弹钢板，他才捡了条命。

sentences.en: In the course of the 1930s steel production in Britain approximately doubled.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪30年代，英国的钢铁产量几乎翻了一番。

sentences.en: In University Square workmen are building a steel fence.
sentences.cn: 在大学广场上，工人们正在修建钢栅栏。

sentences.en: Overhead cranes were lifting giant sheets of steel.
sentences.cn: 高架起重机正吊起一块块巨大的钢板。

sentences.en: Raw-steel production by the nation's mills decreased 2.1% last week.
sentences.cn: 上周该国钢铁厂的原钢产量下降了2.1%。

sentences.en: Shop manager Brian Steel stalled the man until the police arrived.
sentences.cn: 商店经理布赖恩·斯蒂尔将那名男子拖住，直到警方赶到。

sentences.en: stainless steel (= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.cn: 不锈钢小刀

sentences.en: stainless steel(= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.cn: 不锈钢小刀

sentences.en: Steel barriers can bend and absorb the shock.
sentences.cn: 钢制栅栏可以弯曲并能吸收冲击力。

sentences.en: Steel cable will be used to replace worn ropes.
sentences.cn: 将用钢缆替换磨损的绳索。

sentences.en: The pit is ventilated by a steel fan.
sentences.cn: 矿井中用钢制通风机来保持空气流通。

sentences.en: The steel arrives at the factory in coils.
sentences.cn: 钢材被成卷地运到工厂。

sentences.en: The steel workers were relatively indifferent to the issue of nationalization.
sentences.cn: 相对而言，钢铁工人对国有化的议题并不太关心。

sentences.en: The steel works could be seen for miles.
sentences.cn: 这个钢厂几英里外都能看见。

sentences.en: They used steel pins to hold everything in place.
sentences.cn: 他们用钢钉将所有东西都固定住。

words.tran_cn: 似钢的，钢铁般的；钢制的；严格的
钢制的；钢铁业的；坚强的
支持,鼓舞,使坚固,使冷酷

phrases.tran_cn: 不锈钢制品（stainless steel product的复数）
钢铁工业；钢铁业；炼钢工业

trans.tran_cn: 钢制的；钢铁业的；坚强的
钢，钢铁，钢制品，兵器，钢铁工业
trans.tran_en: strong metal that can be shaped easily, consisting of iron and  carbon
